episodes.title: The Shocking Cult Of Scientology
episodes.description:
Forget everything you think you know about organized religion. Today, we’re digging into the baffling, billion-dollar saga of Scientology.

L. Ron Hubbard started with a failed self-help book, then, in a stroke of pure pragmatic genius, decided to pivot to faith. We’re dissecting the entire absurd journey:

What is it? Beyond the E-meters and auditing, we expose the secretive, multi-million-dollar path to "total freedom"—including the infamous, frankly hilarious, Xenu space-opera doctrine.

How did it get legitimized? We unpack the brutal, 40-year legal war against the IRS that ended with a controversial tax-exempt victory, and how the "Attack the Attacker" policy secured its status.

The Price of Belief: From the early days of Dianetics to the modern-day cult allegations, we track the moment public perception soured and how the internet finally laid its most bizarre secrets bare.

This isn't just history; it's a breakdown of how pseudoscience became a profitable religion. Shall we peel back the layers of this fascinating nonsense?
